content: finished measurements at chest 32¼ -38½ -44 -50 3/8 full length 22 -22¾ -23 5/8 -24 3/8 materials drops muskat from garnstudio 700-750-850-900-1000 g color no 09 light brown drops crochet hook size 4 mm / us g/6 or size needed to obtain the correct gauge crochet gauge 16 single_crochet x 10 row on hook size 4mm / us g/6 with muskat = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 11 buttons - approx diameter 2 5 cm / 7/8 published additionally in crochet magazine september 2009 as dazzling details jacket
